variant.name: .Pix
variant.summary: Facilitate a Pix based payment using Google Pay.

histogram.name: FacilitatedPayments.{FacilitatedPaymentsType}.GetClientToken.Latency
histogram.summary: Latency for the call to fetch the client token. The client token is fetched from the platform specific payment library in preparation for facilitating the payment using Google Pay. [Frequency] Logged at most once per page load. [Trigger] Page is loaded and the main frame contains a valid payment code for {FacilitatedPaymentsType}.

histogram.name: FacilitatedPayments.{FacilitatedPaymentsType}.GetClientToken.Result
histogram.summary: Result of whether the call to fetch the client token was successful or not. The client token is fetched from the platform specific payment library in preparation for facilitating the payment using Google Pay. [Frequency] Logged at most once per page load. [Trigger] Page is loaded and the main frame contains a valid payment code for {FacilitatedPaymentsType}.

histogram.name: FacilitatedPayments.{FacilitatedPaymentsType}.InitiatePayment.Latency
histogram.summary: Latency for the InitiatePayment backend endpoint. [Frequency] Logged at most once per page load. [Trigger] User selects a payment instrument from the list of options shown in the {FacilitatedPaymentsType} UI.

histogram.name: FacilitatedPayments.{FacilitatedPaymentsType}.InitiatePayment.Result
histogram.summary: Logs whether the call to the InititaePayment backend endpoint was successful or not. [Frequency] Logged at most once per page load. [Trigger] User selects a payment instrument from the list of options shown in the {FacilitatedPaymentsType} UI.

histogram.name: FacilitatedPayments.{FacilitatedPaymentsType}.InitiatePurchaseAction.Latency
histogram.summary: Logs the latency for the call made to payments platform (client) which faciliates the payment. [Frequency] Logged at most once per page load. [Trigger] User selects a payment instrument from the list of options shown in the {FacilitatedPaymentsType} UI and the backend returns the instruction to trigger the purchase action flow in GMSCore.

histogram.name: FacilitatedPayments.{FacilitatedPaymentsType}.InitiatePurchaseAction.Result
histogram.summary: Logs the result returned for the call made to payments platform (client) which facilitates the payment. [Frequency] Logged at most once per page load. [Trigger] User selects a payment instrument from the list of options shown in the {FacilitatedPaymentsType} UI and the backend returns the instruction to trigger the purchase action flow in GMSCore.

histogram.name: FacilitatedPayments.{FacilitatedPaymentsType}.IsApiAvailable.Latency
histogram.summary: Latency for the call to check whether the FacilitatedPayments API client is available or not. The API client's availability is checked to determine whether Chrome can offer to facilitate the payment using Google Pay. [Frequency] Logged at most once per page load. [Trigger] Page is loaded and the main frame contains a valid payment code for {FacilitatedPaymentsType}.

histogram.name: FacilitatedPayments.{FacilitatedPaymentsType}.IsApiAvailable.Result
histogram.summary: Result of whether the FacilitatedPayments API client is available or not. The API client's availability is checked to determine whether Chrome can offer to facilitate the payment using Google Pay. [Frequency] Logged at most once per page load. [Trigger] Page is loaded and the main frame contains a valid payment code for {FacilitatedPaymentsType}.

histogram.name: FacilitatedPayments.{FacilitatedPaymentsType}.PaymentNotOfferedReason
histogram.summary: On a webpage that is eligible for facilitated payments, this histogram logs the reasons for the payment option not being offered to the user. [Frequency] Logged at most once per page load. [Trigger] Page is loaded and accoridng to the renderer the main frame contains a valid payment code for {FacilitatedPaymentsType}.
